wikipedia_page.main: Ross Cameron Stewart (born 11 July 1996) is a Scottish footballer who plays as a striker for League One club Sunderland.

response: On 24 May 2017, after two years at Cliftonhill, Stewart signed a two-year deal with St Mirren. One of his team-mates at both Cliftonhill and St Mirren Park was another Ross Stewart, a striker who later played for Ross County.
* Ross Stewart (footballer, born 1995) (Ross M. Stewart), Scottish football goalkeeper
* Ross Stewart (footballer, born 1996) (Ross C. Stewart), Scottish football forward for Sunderland A.F.C.
